name: The Great Staff of the Ancient Elf
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
